description: Zero waste - party edition This chocolate dessert bowl is super fun, easy to make and sports a wow factor! Fill it with your favourite ice-cream and fruit, and when you're done you can even eat the bowl!
name: Choc Ice-Cream Bowls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Use the end of a sharp knife (or small pair of scissors) to burst the balloons, then gently peel away from the chocolate bowls. Fill chocolate bowls with scoops of chocolate frozen dessert, strawberries and drizzle any remaining chocolate mix on top. Serve immediately.
